Container.Name: plex-dbrepair
Container.Overview:
You will mount the Plex database directory into this container (usually something like /config/Library/Application Support/Plex Media Server/Plug-in Support/Databases)
The script runs once automagaicaly and reapirs the Pex Database and then exits/Stops the Docker
No Plex docker or process is running while repair is happening! console in the docker and run top to confirm its running!
Container.Requires: YOUR ARE ULTIMATELY RESPONISLBE FOR YOUR DATA! PLEX MUST BE OFF!!! You must mount the DB folder!

Config.Name: Plex Database Folder
Config.Description: Path to the nested database folder that holds the db file to repair!

Config.Name: HEARTBEAT_INTERVAL
Config.Description: Interval between heartbeat messages printed to Docker logs while DBRepair is running.

Config.Name: DBREPAIR_MODE
Config.Description:
Default: automatic DBREPAIR_MODE per script:
Value Menu # Action automatic 2 Check + Repair/Optimize + Reindex check 3 Integrity check only vacuum 4 Vacuum database repair 5 Repair / Optimize reindex 6 Rebuild indexes

Config.Name: PLEX_DB_FILE
Config.Description: DB file name... Main Plex database file to repair.
